Generation II.Gold: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.
Generation II.Silver: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.
Generation II.Crystal: The many small metal particles that cover this Pok é mon 's body reflect bright light well.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix . This Pok é mon is known to dig towards the earth's core. There are records of this Pok é mon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
Generation III.Sapphire: Steelix lives even further underground than Onix . This Pok é mon is known to dig towards the earth's core. There are records of this Pok é mon reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
Generation III.Emerald: Steelix live even further underground than Onix . This Pok é mon is known to dig toward the earth's core, reaching a depth of over six-tenths of a mile underground.
Generation III.FireRed: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than diamond.

Generation IV.Diamond: Tempered underground under high pressure and heat, its body is harder than any metal.
Generation IV.Pearl: It chews its way through boulders with its sturdy jaws. Its eyes can see in the darkness underground.
Generation IV.Platinum: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It's said that if an Onix lives for 100 years, its composition becomes diamondlike as it evolves into a Steelix .
